SEARCH
Package Controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
Controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, PlayerObserver
public class GameController extends Object implements Runnable, PlayerObserver
GameController is the main class that manages the game flow, including user interactions, level transitions, game states, and player actions. It follows the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance of the controller.

    static enum 
    GameController.GameState
    Enumeration representing the different states the game can be in.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by initializing the player, current level, and game objects. Sets the state to RUNNING and plays background music.

    • changeLevel

      public void changeLevel()
      Changes the current level in the game. If the maximum level is reached, transitions to the victory state.

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Changes the game state to PAUSE if it was RUNNING

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Changes the game state to RUNNING if it was PAUSE
